trans-unit.source: Provides a control that can perform custom validation against another control.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制項，這個控制項可以對另一個控制項執行自訂驗證。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: This class behaves identically to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的行為即會相同與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator?displayProperty=nameWithType>Web 伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Developers can choose their own common language runtime delegate to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以選擇要用於驗證自己通用語言執行階段委派。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls on a form raise validator events on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>表單上的控制項驗證程式上引發事件時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單。

trans-unit.source: To disable automatic validation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command> controls to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用自動驗證，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CausesValidation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command>控制項`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the value that a user places into the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox> control is an even number.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否在使用者將放入值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox>控制項是否為偶數。

trans-unit.source: If the value is an even number, then the page is valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為偶數，則頁面是有效的。

trans-unit.source: If not, the page is not valid, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator> displays the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，頁面不是有效的而<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator>顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the properties to be validated are valid.
trans-unit.target: 判斷要驗證的屬性是否有效。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if control properties to be validated are valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要驗證的控制項屬性有效，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Virtual method for derived class to create its own aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立本身彙總 Web 驗證程式之衍生類別的虛擬方法。

trans-unit.source: The Web validator is for getting and setting of the common properties of Web base validator.
trans-unit.target: Web 驗證程式可用於取得及設定 Web 基底驗證程式的通用屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: An aggregated Web validator.
trans-unit.target: 彙總的 Web 驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: Called during the validation stage when ASP.NET processes a Mobile Web Form.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 處理 Mobile Web Form 時於驗證階段呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the validator is valid, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證程式有效則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The value to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value specified by the <paramref name="value" /> parameter passes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 <paramref name="value" /> 參數指定的值通過驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator" /> validates the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator" /> 驗證 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate" /> 屬性的值時會發生。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: If a method is registered with this event, it is called with the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法已向此事件，它就稱為值是<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Validation succeeds only if this event handler returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式傳回時，才會成功驗證`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to trap the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate> event to add logic to validate the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何捕捉<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.CustomValidator.ServerValidate>加入邏輯，驗證頁面的事件。
